game.name: Under Protocol
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 2027. One year since the superpowers’ standoff came to a head. The nuclear winter has lifted, but people still hide in bunkers, afraid of the radiation. Who gets a new home—and who is cast out into the wastes? Lives are in your hands, Captain.
game.shortDescriptionEn: 2027. One year since the superpowers’ standoff came to a head. The nuclear winter has lifted, but people still hide in bunkers, afraid of the radiation. Who gets a new home—and who is cast out into the wastes? Lives are in your hands, Captain.
